title: Java Developer (Expert/Specialist/Architect) (SIGNING BONUS)
description:
We are looking for Java Developers who are able to work perfectly and independently to:
•	Develop software application in JAVA
•	Collaborates with leads to explore existing systems, determines areas of complexity, potential risks to successful implementation, learns the applications capabilities
•	Follows coding standards, builds appropriate unit tests, integration tests and deployment scripts
•	Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code implementation of security and data protection.
•	Contributes to continual improvement by suggesting improvements to user interface, software architecture or new technologies
requirements:
•	5-6+ years of relevant working experience in Java Software
•	Knowledge about JAVA, JVM, Multi-Threading
•	Good understanding with OOP, API
•	Knowledge with Web Server, Web Application Server, Spring framework or other MVC framework, RESTful, MySQL or RDB
